author: enki_0042
title: Innovation back in the good old days
review:
This was an absolutely brilliant set when I got it as a child (late seventies, early eighties) - I could build tractors, off-roaders and all sorts of vehicles one couldn't really build back then without a few extra "different" parts.

 

Suppose it looks very primitive now, but I still love using them to bring back the memories. And they're still more versatile than some of the newer wheels... Get them if you can.
